title: Call an expert
script: Our professional technicians will be sent to your area to scout and count all of the lights that need replacing in your area.

title: Design a project
script: Our architect and engering team will develop a project for your smart house according to government rebate and set a starting date

title: Enjoy your Smart House
script: After everything is completed you will receive the rebate from the government and you will enjoy at least 5 years of free maintenance and savings!
